thread.section_title: KISA phone Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KISA phone | kisaphone.com.au
thread.title: Kevin Woolford
thread.title_full: KISA phone reviewed by Kevin Woolford

author: Kevin Woolford
title: Kevin Woolford
text: Kisa phone is great, but in our case, it still provides a technical challenge to my parent who has cognitive function difficulties. The phone hasnt been used as intended and unfortunately was money wasted purchasing it. No reflection on the phone, just our circumstances. Review written by daughter.
